subject: Words of a killer prompt fear, anger
body:
CNN.com March Update





Member Center















Students angered, disgusted by 

gunman's manifesto





Virginia Tech students reacted with anger, shock and fear to the paranoid manifesto that gunman Cho Seung-Hui mailed the morning of his killing spree.  Cho's disturbing ramblings may have given insight 

into his actions, but they have added an additional layer of terror to already-fresh wounds.


Students angered, disgusted by gunman's manifesto
Student reaction: Killer 'was not a man' 
Watch Cho's menacing last words 

Visit CNN.com for full coverage on the Massacre at Virginia 

Tech.

What can we learn from the tragedy at Virginia Tech?




As more details emerge, Soledad O'Brien and the CNN: Special Investigations Unit puts the terrible events of Monday in 

context and looks at lessons to be learned.


Watch "Massacre at Virginia Tech" on Saturday and Sunday at 8 p.m. ET.
